title: DirectX Error
body: Please, help. I've tried every solution I could find online, uninstalled and reinstalled league, uninstalled and reinstalled my Radeon software, and still I get this error. I don't know what else to do.

replies.body: This error could be caused by an issue with DirectX itself, or even a security setting that's preventing it from being accessed.  As a first step, go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that necessary files are able to launch properly.  It's also really important to make sure your OS is up to date so it has all necessary products.  I hope that helps!

Hello Porocles. Thank you for your response. I have tried all of the options on the permissions guide, and the problem persists. What should I try as a next step? Thanks.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

That sucks to hear, but I appreciate you trying.  Since the steps didn't help, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a deeper look into this case with you.  Grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well and attach the logs it provides for more context.  We will respond back as soon as we can!
